string.text: {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}šlachcianka{?}šlachcič{\\?} z haspadarstva {ISSUE_GIVER_KINGDOM}, {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}paviedamiła{?}paviedamiŭ{\\?} vam pra biazładździe ŭ {TARGET_VILLAGE_SETTLEMENT}. Kali jano nia ścichnie, moža pieraraści ŭ sapraŭdnaje paŭstańnie. {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} užo peŭny čas nia moža naviedać viosku i nie razumieje, čamu tam raptam uźnik pratest. {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}Jana{?}Jon{\\?} choča, kab vy zrazumieli nahodu biazładździa i zaspakoili jaho. Vy vyrašyli pakinuć {COMPANION.LINK} z niekalkimi ludźmi na {RETURN_DAYS} dzion, kab znajści pryčynu biazładździa i razabracca ź im. Jany musiać viarnucca z uznaharodaj u pamiery {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denaraŭ, jak {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}abiacała{?}abiacaŭ{\\?} {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, praz {RETURN_DAYS} dzion.

Tak... Ja sapraŭdy maju prablemu. U adnoj z maich vołaściaŭ niadaŭna pačałosia biazładździe. Ja nia maju mahčymaści razabracca samastojna. Možacie zładzić z prablemaj dla mianie?[ib:closed][if:convo_dismayed]
Viadoma. Raskažycie bolš detalaŭ.

Vioska {TARGET_VILLAGE}, jakoj ja vałodaju, zbuntavałasia. Mnie paviedamili, što niekatoryja žychary admaŭlajucca pracavać i napadajuć na słužboŭcaŭ. Nie mahu zrazumieć pryčynu, z-za jakoj viaskoŭcy raptoŭna pačali isteryku. Hadami ich stanovišča nie mianiałasia. Dabrabyt vioski nie paciarpieŭ, navat padatki nie mianialisia. Ja zanadta zaniaty, kab naviedać viosku samastojna, ale kali vy zmožacie zrazumieć nahodu biazładździa i zadušyć jaho, pierš čym jano vyjdzie z-pad kantrolu, ja ščodra ŭznaharodžu vas.[ib:closed][if:convo_normal]

Vam musicie naviedać viosku i vyśvietlić, što adbyvajecca, ci, kali vy majecie davieranaha kampańjona, možacie pakinuć jaho z {ALTERNATIVE_TROOP_COUNT} vajarami, kab jany ŭcichamiryli biazładździe. Hetaha vinna chapić.[ib:closed][if:convo_pondering]
Što mienavita vy chacicie, kab ja {?PLAYER.GENDER}zrabiła{?}zrabiŭ{\?}?
Nie turbujciesia, ja dam rady hetamu biazładździu.
Rastučaje Biazładździe

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}paviedamiła{?}paviedamiŭ{\\?} pra patencyjnaje paŭstannie ŭ vioscy {TARGET_VILLAGE}. {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}Jana nie ŭpeŭniena{?}Jon nie ŭpeŭnieny{\\?} ŭ jaho pryčynie i choča, kab niechta zrazumieŭ nahodu biazładździa i zaspakoił jaho, pry patrebie siłaj.
Moj kampańjon i {REQUIRED_TROOP_AMOUNT} vajaroŭ raźbiarucca z biazładździem za {RETURN_DAYS} dzion.
Biez sumnievu, biazładździe ŭ {TARGET_VILLAGE} budzie ŭcichamirana[ib:closed][if:convo_grateful]. Dziakuj, {PLAYER}, za dapamohu ŭ jaho spynieńni.

Dziakuj {PLAYER.LINK}. [if:convo_pondering] Biez sumnievu, vašyja ludzi daduć rady hetamu biazładździu. {TARGET_VILLAGE} budzie ŭcichamirana. Žadaju dadać, ja napahatovie spłacić vam {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} za vašyja turboty.
Ludzi havorać pra rastučaje paŭstańnie ŭ {TARGET_VILLAGE}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} musić zrabić štości chutka, kali žadaje zadušyć jaho.[if: convo_predatory]

Your companion {COMPANION.LINK} and your men returns with the news of their success. Apparently a corrupt tax collector was stealing gold from the villagers. {COMPANION.LINK} dealt with them easily, ending the unrest, and the village was grateful. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is grateful and sends {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\\?} regards with a purse full of {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} denars.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has tasked you with handling the mounting unrest coming out of {TARGET_VILLAGE}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} hasnt been able to visit the village in some time, and isnt sure why the village is suddenly protesting. They want you to investigate the cause of the unrest and stop a potential rebellion before it starts. You should speak with some of the villagers to uncover the cause.

After speaking with the villagers, Youve discovered that the recent cause of unrest is due to an increase in taxes. This is strange because {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} said the taxes had not changed in years. You should confront the tax collector who is somewhere in {TARGET_VILLAGE}.
You have arrested the corrupt tax collector after a brief fight with his body guards. This should quell the unrest. You should deliver him to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to collect your reward.

You tried to fight the tax collectors bodyguards, but you were overcome. They left you alive, but they are now long gone. You failed to deliver justice for the village, but at least the problem is solved.
After forcibly engaging the unruly peasants, You have successfully quelled the unrest in {TARGET_VILLAGE}. You should visit {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to receive your reward.

You were attacked by the villagers after they saw you accepting a bribe. You were overcome, and now the village is pratically in a full blown rebellion. Your actions made the unrest worse, and {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious!
The tax collector was released before you could turn them in to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. You will not be able to deliver justice for {TARGET_VILLAGE}, but at least the situation is resolved.
You failed to quell the unrest in the village in time. The situation in {TARGET_VILLAGE} has gotten much worse. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will remember how you betrayed their trust.
you quelled the unrest in the village, but failed to report to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} in time. The situation in {TARGET_VILLAGE} is resolved, but you forfeited your reward from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}s village {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} was raided. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
{COMPANION.LINK} is no longer a member of your clan. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} was terminated.
You have successfully quelled the mounting unrest in {TARGET_VILLAGE}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is grateful for your service and offers you a purse full of {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars for your trouble.

Go to {TARGET_VILLAGE}, talk to the villagers, and learn of their plight. Try to solve this peacefully if you can, but if necessary, I give you permission to smack some sense into these ingrates. Once this threat of rebellion is gone for good, Ill pay you for your service.[ib:closed][if:convo_relaxed_happy]
Have you visited {TARGET_VILLAGE} yet and spoken with the people?[ib:closed][if:convo_innocent_smile]
Ive been sent by {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} to help calm the unrest in this village. What can you tell me about whats happening?
{QUEST_GIVER.NAME} seemed to think this unrest was random. Tell me, who do you deliver your taxes to?

That wretched tax collector is who. He sits in the village behind his fancy desk like an ogre, surrounded by his henchmen. I dont know why hes even still here. Hes already stolen everything we have.[ib:closed2][if:convo_very_stern]
Hmm...perhaps I should pay a visit to this tax collector. Thank you for the information.
Can I help you?[ib:confident][if:convo_confused_annoyed]
I was sent to investigate and quell the unrest in this village. The villagers claim they are irritated because of increased taxes. Do you know anything about this?

Bah! The villagers are a bunch of crybabies. They hide gold when they should be paying what they owe. The increase in taxes is necessary for the good of the realm. Theyve been ordered directly by lord {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}. Im sorry but its out of my hands. Im simply following the wishes of my lord.[ib:nervous2][if:convo_annoyed]
Thats interesting, because according to {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} there hasnt been any change in taxes in years. I wonder if you might be the cause of the increase in taxes yourself.
How about I lower taxes to a more...reasonable level, and we just forget this conversation ever happened? I have a bag of gold with your name on it if you agree.[ib:nervous][if:convo_nervous]
Very well. Ill tell {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} everything here is perfectly normal, and the unrest should die down on its own.
Thank you, give my regards to {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}.[ib:normal][if:happy]
Sorry, but unlike you Im not so corrupt. Youre under arrest. I will deliver you to {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}.
Another soul lost to bandits...what a shame. Roads just arent safe these days. Men, deal with this fool![ib: aggressive][if:convo_evil_smile]
I saw you take that money! Youre just as corrupt as that tax collector. This is the last straw. Were not getting taxed any more without a fight.[rb:very_negative][ib: aggressive][if:convo_furious]
Wait! This is just a big misunderstanding!
Ill show you peasants how to behave!
Tax Collector
Tax Collector Bodyguard
Wait! Please! I surrender, dont hurt me.[ib:weary][if:convo_terrified]
Have you come to mock me?
Welcome back. Any news on the village?[ib:confident3][if:convo_focused_happy]

Ive brought the source of your unrest. It was a corrupt tax collector who had been extrajudicially increasing taxes and lining his own pockets. He attacked me with his bodyguards when I refused his bribe.

Oh my! I had no idea this was happening. Ill make sure justice is done to this scoundrel. Who knew a corrupt tax collector would be able to cause so much unrest! Thank you for dealing with this peacefully. As promised, heres your reward. I hope it is sufficient.[rb:unsure][ib:nervous2][if:convo_confused_normal]

{PLAYER.NAME}! Ive just received news of your work in {TARGET_VILLAGE}.Shame you were forced to confront the peasants with force, but at least theyve learned their place. Thank you. I hope this reward is more than sufficient.[ib:closed2]
Yes...A Christian has been causing trouble in the village. Would you be willing to help deal with him?[ib:closed][if:convo_dismayed]

A Christian has been present in {TARGET_VILLAGE} for a few weeks. He keeps raving about eternal damnation or some nonsense. He has constantly insulted and mocked our ways. A few days ago, one of our statues of Buddha was torn down in the night, and I think he did it. The people are angry and scared of his presence and want him gone. I unfortunately dont have the authority to do it myself, so Im offering payment for you to deal with them quitely.[ib:closed][if:convo_normal]
Very well. I will deal with this Christian.
Thank you my lord. The people will be very happy to hear this.[ib:confident3][if:convo_focused_happy]
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} told you of a Christian causing trouble in {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}. You used your authority to exile them.

A Christian has been present in {TARGET_VILLAGE} for a few weeks. He keeps raving about eternal damnation or some nonsense. He has constantly insulted and mocked our ways. A few days ago, one of our statues of Buddha was torn down in the night, and I think he did it. The people are angry and scared of his presence and want him gone. I am sure that, as the lord of this district, you will not let this vagabond continue to cause misery. I urge you to use your authority to force him to leave the village.
As the lord of this village, I hereby order the Christian exiled. Tell the Christian to leave immediately or face my wrath!
Troublesome Missionary
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} told you of a Christian in {TARGET_VILLAGE} causing trouble. They want someone to get rid of them, by force if necessary.
I heard theres a Christian in {TARGET_VILLAGE} causing trouble. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is looking for a way to deal with them.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} asked you to deal with a Christian causing trouble in {TARGET_VILLAGE}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} claims the Christian has been disrespecting them and making people upset. They want you to get rid of the Christian. You should speak with them. They are in the same village of {TARGET_VILLAGE}.
You decided to kill the Christian to solve the problem. Not exactly the most diplomatic solution, but it gets the job done. You should speak with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to receive your reward.

After meeting with the missionary, he has agreed to leave {TARGET_VILLAGE} if you protect him and escort him to a port. He has joined your party, and has agreed to offer you compensation when you reach a port.
You have defeated the samurai hunting down the missionary. You are now free to escort them to a port.

The samurai have defeated you and taken the missionary with them. There is no way escort them to a port now. Despite this, you did manage to deal with the Christian, so {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will still give you a reward.
You gave up the missionary to the samurai. He will surely be killed now, but at least you dealt with him. You should return to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to receive your reward.
You have successfully dealt with the missionary and received your reward.
You have lost the Christian and failed to escort him to a port. You have still dealt with him however, and you should return to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to receive your reward.
You dealt with the missionary, but failed to report to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} in time. The situation in {TARGET_VILLAGE} is resolved, but you forfeited your reward from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You failed to deal with the missionary in time. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will remember how you betrayed their trust.

You have successfully escorted the missionary to a port and received a reward. Now that the missionary has been dealt with, you should now go to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} in {TARGET_VILLAGE} to receive your original reward.
Saeki Genichiros Party
Go find the Christian and deal with them. I dont care how, just get rid of them. Theyre somewhere here in the village. Once theyre gone Ill pay you.[ib:closed][if:convo_relaxed_happy]
Have you dealt with the Christian yet?[ib:closed][if:convo_innocent_smile]
Hello! Would you like to hear about Jesus Christ?[ib:normal][if:convo_relaxed_happy]
I hear youve been causing trouble in this village. The people dont want you here. You need to leave.

What do you mean? Im peacefully spreading the good news of Jesus to the ignorant pagans of this land. Worshipping false idols is a sin. Sin leads to eternal punishment. Im trying to save these backwards heathens from that.[ib:closed2][if:convo_confused_annoyed]

Youre frightening the villagers with this nonsense. Youre insulting the people you came to help. You have no respect for us, and if you keep this up, youre gonna anger the wrong person, and you wont live long enough to save anyone.

Alright, its been obvious the people here havent been very receptive to the love of Jesus Christ. Ill leave, but only if you escort me to a port so I can gain passage off this dreadful country. I can pay you for your troubles.[ib:normal][if:convo_dismayed]
Very well, I will escort you to a port, but you need to promise to not come back here.
I promise. Thank you, lets leave immediately.[ib:normal][if:happy]
No thanks, Ill just deal with you now. (Attack)
Wait, what?[ib:confused][if:convo_terrified]
Hello again.
Ive dealt with the missionary. You wont be hearing from him again.
Yes, I know. The whole village saw you murder him. Not exactly what I had in mind, but it works. Heres your payment as promised.[ib:normal][if:convo_relaxed_happy]
Thank you. This news puts a lot of people here at ease. Here is your reward.[ib:normal][if:convo_innocent_smile]
You there! We know youre harboring a Christian. Hand him over and nobody gets hurt.[ib: aggressive][if:convo_very_stern]
Who are you, and what do you want with him?

My name is Saeki Genichiro. I am a samurai in the service of {VILLAGE_LORD.LINK}. That Christian insulted my lord, calling him a demon. He deserves death. Now I ask again. Hand him over.[ib: aggressive][if:convo_very_stern]
I dont want any trouble. You can have him.
Wise decision. Dont worry, he wont suffer.[ib: closed][if:convo_very_stern]
This Christian is under my protection. I will not give him up without a fight.
So be it. Prepare yourselves.[ib: aggressive][if:convo_very_stern]

Thank you stranger. Please accept this gold. You could have given me up to those samurai or killed me back at the village, but I can tell you are an honorable man. May God bless you in your journeys.[ib:confident3][if:convo_focused_happy]

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} told you about a suspicious merchant operating outside {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}. They are selling goods at much lower prices, undercutting the merchants business. They want you to investigate this merchant, and if possible, determine how they are able to make profit as such low prices. You decided to leave {COMPANION.LINK} with some men for {RETURN_DAYS} days to investigate the merchant. They should return with the reward of {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars as promised by {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} after {RETURN_DAYS} days.

Unfortunately yes. A group outside the city have been reported selling goods at extremely low prices. Their prices are so low that no one is buying my goods, and many of the merchants here are suffering.[ib:nervous2][if:convo_dismayed]

The group showed up a few weeks ago. They have been selling goods for far cheaper than any reasonable merchant could have acquired them for, causing a mild rush of citizens to purchase goods from them instead of from the reputable merchants of {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}. If this keeps up, Ill go out of business. I want you to investigate the group, and try to find who their supplier is.[ib:nervous2][if:convo_dismayed]
You can investigate the group yourself, or maybe you can leave one of your companions and {ALTERNATIVE_TROOP_COUNT} men with them to investigate.[ib:nervous2][if:convo_dismayed]
Ill look into this merchant.
{QUEST_GIVER} has told you of a group selling goods at very low prices. They want you to investigate the group and find out how theyre able to profit.
I will have one of my companions and {REQUIRED_TROOP_AMOUNT} of my men investigate the merchant for {RETURN_DAYS} days.
Thank you {PLAYER.NAME}. Im sure your companion will be able to uncover their secrets.
Thank you {PLAYER.NAME}. Im ready to pay you {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars for your trouble.
I hear the merchants in {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT} are having trouble with some competition. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is looking for someone to help.

Your companion {COMPANION.LINK} and your men returns with the news of their success. Apparently the merchant was no merchant at all, but actually bandits selling stolen goods. {COMPANION.LINK} dealt with them permanently. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is grateful and sends {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\\?} regards with a purse full of {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} denars.
Suspicious Merchant

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has asked me to find a merchant who are selling goods at very low prices. They are suspicious of how they can make a profit and wants me to investigate the group. They are just outside the walls of {QUEST_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}.

After discovering the goods were likely stolen, the suspicious merchant and his thugs attacked you. You managed to defeat them and claim their stolen goods. You should now report to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} in {QUEST_GIVER_SETTLEMENT} to claim your reward.

After discovering the goods were likely stolen, the suspicious merchant and his thugs attacked you. You were unable to defeat them in combat. However, you did manage to drive them away, completing your original task. You should now report to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} in {QUEST_GIVER_SETTLEMENT} to claim your reward.
You have dealt with the supiscious merchant. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} thanks you, and gave you {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars for your trouble.
You failed to deal with the suspicious merchant in time. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will remember how you betrayed their trust.

Excellent. Go find the group and try to figure out why they are set up outside the city. I have a feeling its because they didnt acquire their goods legimately. Once you give me what information on them you can, Ill reward you handsomely.[ib:hip][if:convo_mocking_aristocratic]
Have you investigated that merchant yet?[ib:hip][if:convo_mocking_aristocratic]
Suspicious Merchants Party
Hello there, looking to buy? Lowest prices around.[ib:hip2][if:convo_nonchalant]
Lets see what you have. (Trade)
Thank you, come again.[ib:confident3][if:convo_nonchalant]
These goods are quite cheap. May I ask where you acquired them?
Sorry, a good merchant never reveals his secrets. Lets just say, our suppliers cant resist our offers.[ib:warrior2][if:convo_stern]
Right...I also noticed your foodstuff is not being stored properly. It will rot if not sealed.
Eh? You calling me a lousy merchant?[ib:aggressive2][if:convo_insulted]
Im not sure you are a merchant. Youre dressed and armed more like a bandit. Plus, youre operating outside the city which is a little suspicious.
Look pal, you can either finish that train of thought, or you can buy some cheap goods and not ask any more questions. Whatll it be?[ib:warrior][if:convo_furious]
These goods are clearly stolen. Youre coming with me to answer for you crimes.
Not without a fight Im not.[rb:very_negative][ib:warrior][if:convo_furious]
Alright, I dont want any trouble. Goodbye.
Smart lad.[ib:confident3][if:convo_nonchalant]
Welcome back, did you find out anything about those merchants?[ib:hip][if:convo_mocking_aristocratic]
Ive come to the conclusion they are bandits selling stolen goods. They have many armed men. If you wish to get rid of them, you will need a sizeable force.
Ah, I had a gut feeling that was true, but needed to verify it. Thank you for looking into this. As promised, here is your reward.[ib:nervous2][if:convo_dismayed]
Yes, they are selling stolen goods. They attacked me when I confronted them. Unfortunately I failed to defeat them, and they left the area.
Oh my. I didnt expect you to actually try to engage them. Well at least theyre gone now. As promised, here is your reward.[ib:nervous2][if:convo_shocked]
Yes, they are selling stolen goods. They attacked me when I confronted them. I defeated them and took them prisoner.

Oh my. I didnt expect you engage them, let alone defeat them! Ill give you a bonus for dealing with them directly. As promised, here is your reward.[rb:very_positive][ib:hip][if:convo_mocking_aristocratic]
Blood Is Sharper Than Swords

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, a notable from {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}, has tasked you with shadowing their son while he is travelling to another city to sell weapons. Once he arrives, Youll have to follow him closely to see whether he is pocketing some of the profits. If so, {ISSUE_GIVER} wants you to bring their son back. You decided to leave {COMPANION.LINK} with some men for {RETURN_DAYS} days to follow him and uncover the truth. They should return with the reward of {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars as promised by {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} after {RETURN_DAYS} days.
Yes, Interested in some detective work?[ib:convo_calm_friendly]

Im a weaponsmith by trade, specializing in katanas. Once a week, after Ive finished a batch of swords, my son takes them to a nearby city to sell them. However, the money Ive been receiving has been lower than normal. I believe he might be stealing some of the money for himself.

I want you to follow him, keeping a low profile, and watch him to make sure hes not misappropriating the funds for himself. If it turns out he is, please dont hurt him, just bring him back to me. Hes still family after all. If you have a companion you trust, you can leave them and {ALTERNATIVE_TROOP_COUNT} men to shadow him.
Dont worry, I will make sure your son is not misbehaving.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} suspects their son of pocketing some of the profits when he goes to sell weapons to another city. He wants someone to follow him and find out if its true.
I will have one of my companions and {REQUIRED_TROOP_AMOUNT} of my men investigate your son and follow them for {RETURN_DAYS} days.

Im relieved youve agreed to help. This has been weighing on me heavily. I hope my son is innocent, but I must know the truth. My son will soon leave the city. You should wait till he leaves then follow him. Id recommend not to get distracted and to solve this quickly, as he will copmlete his journey in about a week. Thank you, {PLAYER}, for looking into this.
I heard a rumor that {QUEST_GIVER}s son is stealing from the family business. Not exactly a good look.

Your companion {COMPANION.LINK} and your men return with the news of their success. {COMPANION.LINK} followed {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to a spot near the city, where they observed him selling weapons to bandits. {COMPANION.LINK} dealt with the bandits, arrested the son, and delivered him back to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is grateful and sends {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\\?} regards with a purse full of {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} denars.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a notable from {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}, has tasked you with shadowing their son while he is travelling to {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} to sell weapons. Once he arrives, Youll have to follow him closely to see whether he is pocketing some of the profits. If so, {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} wants you to bring their son back. The merchants son will soon leave {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}. You should wait there until they leave.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}s son has left {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}. You should begin following him.
You have observed {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}s son meeting with some bandits. You should hurry to confront him in the act.
You have accepted a bribe from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}s son. You should return to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} and lie to them that their son is not misusing their weapons.
You have taken all the goods for yourself, effectively stealing from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. Theres no way you can accomplish {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}s task after this.
You have confronted the merchants son, defeated the bandits, and should now deliver him to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You ran away from a fight with the bandits when challenged. You cant complete {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}s task now.
You have successfully delivered the merchants son to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} after catching him misusing the goods and have received your reward.
You have lost the son as your prisoner, and can no longer complete {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}s task.
You defeated the bandits after demanding their goods. Their goods are yours, but you can no longer complete {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}s task, as you have stolen their entire shipment.
You failed to defeat the bandits. Luckily they left you alive. It is impossible to complete {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}s task now.
Thank you. Hes leaving today so keep on the lookout for him. And remember, do not hurt him.[if:convo_focused_happy]
Have you followed my son and uncovered if hes pocketing extra money? [ib:closed][if:convo_innocent_smile]
I will follow them right away
Can I help you?
No, sorry. Goodbye.
Who let the wannabe ronin in here?[ib:closed2][if:convo_predatory]
Can I help you?[ib:nervous][if:convo_nervous]

My name is {PLAYER.NAME}, I was sent by {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to follow you, and to make sure you werent pocketing any of the money made from selling your fathers swords. From the looks of this, it appears youre doing much worse than that.

What? My father sent you? No...This is all just a big misunderstanding. These are just my business associates. This is a simple business transaction. Just ordinary business here, nothing suspicious at all.[ib:normal2][if:convo_shocked]
You insult the wannabe ronin. They clearly dont believe you. How about you confess your dishonor like a man?[ib:closed2][if:convo_predatory]

It was not supposed to go like this. Alright fine. What if I offer you a handcrafted sword from my father, a renowned swordsmith? Its worth more than whatever reward youre expecting to get from bringing me back.[ib:normal2][if:convo_calm_friendly]
Hmm, alright, Ill take your sword, and Ill tell your father theres nothing going on.
Thank you stranger. Ill never do this again I swear. I owe you a great deal.[ib:closed2][if:convo_focused_happy]
One measly sword? You insult me. Youll give me your entire shipment if you want to ensure your freedom.
The whole shipment!? Are you out of your mind? Theres no way I can do that. One sword is my final offer. Take it or leave it.[rb:negative][ib:closed2][if:convo_very_stern]
Alright, give me the sword, and Ill tell your father theres nothing going on.
Thank you stranger. Ill never do this again I swear. I owe you a great deal.[ib:closed2][if:convo_focused_happy]
Your offer isnt good enough. Im taking this shipment for myself.
Help me and you can have half the swords![ib:normal][if:terrified]
Hmm, not a bad trade. Alright ronin, lets dance.[ib:warrior][if:convo_evil_smile]
Lets go (starts combat)
Wait, I dont want to fight, Im leaving.
The whole shipment? Ah, fine, I guess I dont have a choice. Take it and get out of my sight.[ib:normal2][if:convo_dismayed]
Well this is awkward. I was expecting those weapons for myself. Would you be willing to trade them for some goods? Very good quality. Very cheap.[ib:closed2][if:convo_undecided_open]
Sure, sounds like a good deal.
Pleasure doing business with you.
No thanks, not interested.
I dont think you understand. We needs those weapons. One way or another were getting them.[ib:warrior][if:convo_evil_smile]
No need for violence, Ill trade.
Id like to see you try. (starts combat)
No. I will not accept your pitiful bribe. Youre coming with me.
Help me and you can have the swords![ib:normal][if:terrified]
Hmm, not a bad trade. Alright ronin, lets dance.[ib:warrior][if:convo_evil_smile]
You will regret this. (starts combat)
Have you followed my son and uncovered if hes pocketing extra money? [ib:closed][if:convo_innocent_smile]
I have. Your son is not stealing from you. I found no evidence of theft.

Thank you {PLAYER.NAME}. That is a huge relief. I was worried my son was acting dishonorably. Now I have to figure out why my profits are so low. Maybe Ill sell the goods myself next time. As promised, here is your reward.[ib:convo_focused_happy][if:demure]
I have. Your son was doing more than stealing from you. He was trading your weapons to bandits for higher profits.
What?! Is this true son?[rb:negative][if:shocked]
Im sorry father. I messed up.[ib:nervous][if:convo_dismayed]

Ill deal with you later. Thank you for looking into this {PLAYER.NAME}. I never would of imagined this happening. Here is your reward, and as a bonus, I wish to offer you one of my blades. May it serve you well.[if:convo_annoyed][ib:normal]
Return to Service
You should return to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to continue your duties. If you take too long, you may be considered deserting. They should be near {SETTLEMENT}.
You have rejoined the retinue of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You have failed to rejoin the retinue of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. If you attempt to enlist with them now, they will not remember you.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has passed away. It is impossible to join their retinue now.
You have chosen not to reenlist with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You are now at war with {FACTION}. It is impossible to complete this task.
Ah, you managed to return. Do you wish to rejoin the army?
Yes, my Lord, I wish to rejoin your retinue.
Very well. Welcome back.
I wish to end my service to you, my Lord.
I see. Very well.
Sorry, my Lord, not yet.
Very well. Is there anything else?
Ah, youve sent a messenger. Are you planning on rejoining the army soon?
Yes, my Lord, I will join soon.
Good. Do hurry back. Is there anything else?
You have enlisted with another lord. It is impossible to complete this task.
Attack Bandits
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} asked you to defeat 50 bandits, preferably near {FACTION} territory. You were given some troops to deal with the threat.
You have defeated the required number of bandits. You should return to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}
You have chosen not to accept this task with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, and have returned to service as normal.
You have completed your task and rejoined the retinue of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You failed to defeat enough bandits in time. You should report back to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} soon or be branded a deserter.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has passed away. It is impossible to complete their task now.
You are now at war with {FACTION}. It is impossible to complete this task.

{PLAYER.NAME}, I have received reports of bandits preying on our trade. I need you to go deal with them and restore order. I will give you command of a detachment to hunt them down. You can keep whatever loot you find.
Of course, my liege. I will bring justice to those criminals.
Good. Rejoin my command when youve dealt with enough.
I am afraid I wont be able to fulfill this task right now, my liege. I must refuse.
You refuse to defend your lieges holdings from criminals? You are a disgrace, {PLAYER.NAME}. I will remember this.
{PLAYER.NAME}. You still havent defeated enough bandits. Get back out there and finish the job.
Yes my liege. I will leave immediately.
Sorry my liege. I am unable to fulfill this task. I ask to return to your service as normal.
I am disappointed {PLAYER.NAME}. Return to your post.
Welcome back {PLAYER.NAME}. The bandits you defeated will increase the security of the realm. You have my thanks. Return to your post as normal.
Yes, my liege.
Very good.
Defeated Bandits
Attack the enemies of {FACTION}
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} asked you to defeat at least {NUMOFENEMIES} of the enemies of {FACTION}. This includes caravans, villagers, mercenaries, and lords.
You have defeated the required number of enemies. You should return to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You have chosen not to accept this task with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, and have returned to service as normal.
You have completed your task and rejoined the retinue of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You failed to defeat enough enemies in time. You should report back to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} soon or be branded a deserter.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has passed away. It is impossible to complete their task now.
You are now at war with {FACTION}. It is impossible to complete this task.

{PLAYER.NAME}, we need to cut the supply lines of our enemies. Im giving you some soldiers. Use them to ravage the countryside to stop anyone who can assist the enemy armies. Caravans, peasants, patrols, and even lords if you think you can handle it, are all fair game. After youve dealt a significant enough blow, return to me.
I will do as you ask, my lord.
Good. When the enemy is starving it will be much easier to defeat them. Good luck.
I am afraid I wont be able to fulfill this task right now, my liege. I must refuse.
Wars are won with logistics. If you cant help me destroy them, what use are you to me? Get out of my sight.
{PLAYER.NAME}. You still havent defeated enough enemies. Get back out there and finish the job.
Yes my liege. I will leave immediately.
Sorry my liege. I am unable to fulfill this task. I ask to return to your service as normal.
I am disappointed {PLAYER.NAME}. Return to your post.

Welcome back {PLAYER.NAME}. I am very impressed by your actions. The enemies you defeated will deal a blow to our rivals. You have my thanks, and will be greatly rewarded. Return to your post as normal.
Yes, my liege.
The war has ended before you could complete your task. You should rejoin the retinue of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
Deliver Supplies for Army
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} asked you deliver supplies from {SETTLEMENT} to their army. You should speak with {SUPPLIER} to get them.
You have gathered the supplies from {SUPPLIER}. You should return to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
{SETTLEMENT} has been captured by the {SETTLEMENT_NEW_OWNER}. It is impossible to get the supplies now. You should return to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has passed away. It is impossible to complete their task now.
You have chosen not to accept this task with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, and have returned to service as normal.
You have completed your task and rejoined the retinue of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You failed to deliver the supplies in time. You should report back to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} soon or be branded a deserter.
You are now at war with {FACTION}. It is impossible to complete this task.

{PLAYER.NAME}, I have commissioned some supplies from {SETTLEMENT}. I need you to go to {SUPPLIER} to collect them and bring them back. They are already paid for. Our army relies on these goods, so return quickly with them.
I will, my liege. Those supplies will be quickly gathered.
Good. Rejoin my command when youve gathered the supplies.
I am afraid I wont be able to fulfill this task right now, my liege. I must refuse.
When you and your comrades are eating grass remember its your fault, {PLAYER.NAME}. Get out of here now. I will remember this.
{PLAYER.NAME}. Where are the goods I told you to get? Get back out there and finish the job.
Yes my liege. I will leave immediately.
Can I help you?
Im here on behalf of my lord, {QUESTGIVER}. I am here to collect supplies.
Ah. Here you are. Make sure they get there safely.
I will. Thank you.
Army supplies added to inventory.
Welcome back {PLAYER.NAME}. These goods will help our forces. You have my thanks. Return to your post as normal.
Yes, my liege.
Very good.
Im here on behalf of my lord, {QUESTGIVER}. I am here to collect supplies.
Im here on behalf of my lord, {QUESTGIVER}. I am here to collect supplies.
{SETTLEMENT_NAME} has been scouted.
Scout Enemy Fortifications
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} asked you to scout the enemy settlement(s) {ALL_SETTLEMENTS}. You should go there and get as close as possible to gather information. You should avoid combat unless necessary.
You have scouted {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.
You managed to scout the enemy settlements. You should now report back to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
The kingdoms are now at peace. There is no longer a need to scout the settlements. You should return to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You have completed your task and rejoined the retinue of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You couldnt gather the required information on the enemy settlements in time. You should report back to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} soon or be branded a deserter.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has passed away. It is impossible to complete their task now.
You have chosen not to accept this task with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, and have returned to service as normal.
You are now at war with {FACTION}. It is impossible to complete this task.

Greeting {PLAYER.NAME}. We will soon march into enemy territory, but I cant lead my men into an unknown situation. I need you to lead a forward detachment and scout the settlements of {NEARBY_SETTLEMENT_LIST} and observe the defenses. Your priority is to gather intel, so be careful to avoid engagements unless youre absolutely sure to win. When youre done, report back to me so I can plan our next move accordingly.
As you command, my liege. I will proceed with caution and discretion and come back with the information you requested.
I am afraid I wont be able to fulfill this task right now, my liege. I must refuse.
I am very disappointed {PLAYER.NAME}. Remove yourself from my sight if you are not going to do your duty.
{PLAYER.NAME}. You still havent scouted the settlements. Get back out there and finish the job.
Yes my liege. I will leave immediately.
Welcome back {PLAYER.NAME}. This scouting report will help us greatly in the war effort. You have my thanks. Return to your post as normal.
Good. Hurry now. I will be awaiting your return.
Become a vassal of {FACTION}
You have been given the oppurtunity to become a vassal of the {QUEST_GIVER.FACTION}. You should speak to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to accept.
You have chosen not to become a vassal of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You have become a vassal of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
You failed to speak with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} in time. They have forgotten their offer of vassalage and it is no longer valid.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has passed away. It is unlikely the offer to become a vassal of {QUEST_GIVER.FACTION} extends to the new ruler. This opportunity has slipped past your fingers.
You have joined another kingdom instead.
You are now at war with {FACTION}. It is impossible to become their vassal now.
Greetings {PLAYER.NAME}, I take it you got my letter? Do you wish to accept the responsibility of vassalage?
Yes my lord, I wish to serve you.
Excellent. Allow me to administer the oath.
Im sorry, my lord. I cannot accept.
Really? Are you sure? I will not offer you this again.
On Second though, I would like to become a vassal.
Im sorry, but I must refuse.
Very well. I hope you dont regret this. May your sword strike true.
Thanks to your actions, the security of all towns under your liege has slightly increased.
Thanks to your actions, your army is a more cohesive.
